{{Infobox figure skater |name= Grant Hochstein |image= 2010 JWC Grant HOCHSTEIN.jpg |caption= Hochstein in 2010. |fullname = Grant Hochstein |country= [[United States]] |birth_date= {{birth date and age|1990|07|16}} |birth_place= Warren |hometown= [[Grosse Pointe Park, Michigan]] |residence= |height= {{convert|1.65|m|ftin|0|abbr=on}} |coach= Lindsay O'Donoghue, Maria Moscato |choreographer= Jodie Tasich |skating club= [[St. Clair Shores, Michigan|St. Clair Shores FSC]] |beganskating = 1999 |retired= |combined total= 194.30 |combined date= [[2010 World Junior Figure Skating Championships|2010 Junior Worlds]] |SP score= 71.35 |SP date= 2010 Junior Worlds |FS score= 122.95 |FS date= 2010 Junior Worlds }} '''Grant Hochstein''' (born July 16, 1990 in Warren) is an [[United States|American]] [[figure skater]]. He placed 7th at the [[2010 United States Figure Skating Championships|2010 U.S. Championships]] and 5th at the [[2010 World Junior Figure Skating Championships|2010 World Junior Championships]]. Hochstein works as a coach in addition to competing. He caught the flu at the [[2011 United States Figure Skating Championships|2011 U.S. Championships]] and competed with a fever. == Programs == {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !
